

Package Documentation: ZiopcPy
==============================

The ZiopcPy package implement mixture models for data in which the *ordinal* response variable is characterized by an *excessive* number of observations in one of the ordinal outcomes.
Zero-inflated:


Guide
^^^^^

   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:

   ziopcpy_tutorial
   api
   contact
